item.title: Kubernetes v1.17 new feature preview: topology-aware service routing
item.author: roc@imroc.io (roc)
item.description: Hello everyone, I'm roc, from the Tencent Kubernetes Engine (TKE) team. Today I will introduce a new feature of kubernetes in v1.17 that I am involved in: topology-aware service routing. This article is translated from my Chinese blog post, which received a great response in China and was reprinted by many well-known Chinese container technology media accounts. Glossary Topological domain: Indicates a certain type of “place” in the cluster, such as node, rack, zone or region etc.
